description: Round 5 HIV Grant ZIM-509-G10-H: Program to support the scale up of ART and HIV Testing and Counseling Services in 22 districts in Zimbabwe

subproject.corporate outcome: Strengthened capacities to mainstream action into national policies, plans and strategies on the socio-economic causes and consequences of HIV and the linkage to the health MDG
subproject.description: To increase awareness and commitment among policy makers, leaders, communities and PLWHA that HIV is a treatable disease; and To increase the number of people with advanced HIV disease receiving ART as part of a comprehensive treatment and care package.
subproject.title: Scale up of ART and HIV T&C se

title: Scale up of ART and HIV services ZIM-509-G10-H
